div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem x die
mensis aprilis anno quo Supra

The said day the balyeis assignit the last pennult day of aprile
to Robert gothtray the prior of the Carmelitis and Jonhne
Waus tile bring thar richtis and chartiris quhilkis thai
haue and will vys' anent the marchis and diuers' debatable'
betuix thar' landis liand' to giddir in the grene for the
decision' of the debetabile marchis betuix thame

The saide day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gevin
for dome that William of gareauche falyeit in his preyf anent
thre elne of franche brone clath that he tuk to preyve that vmquhile
William scherar' laid' to him ane belt of Elizibethis setonez' in
wed' of the said' iij eln' ilkan eln' xxiiij s' for the quhilkis
the said' Williame gareauche suld' deliuer the said' belt to the
said' Elizibeth and resaue ane siluer pece contening fiwe vnce
quhilkis the said elizibeth pandit of the saide pece to hir said'
Sone and pertening to him of ayrschip

the saide day Robert of crag grantit him redy tile Amend' to alexander chamer ale
the skath done to be his lande be his seruandis be the sicht of him
Self and vthiris gudmen of the tone

Some pait for redschip of the tone to ormind pursevant of the xvij li' and x s' acht
to the Comproller'
Alexander menyes xxti s'
Robert blinsele xx s'
Dauid menyes xx s'
Alexander chamer xx s'
vijo maij Robert Crag xxx s'
bessy Wormet xx s'
Jonhne Colison' xx s'
Alexander ch mar' xx s'
Thome prat iij li'
Jonhne blak xx s'
Jonet craufurd' xx s'
Mathow branche xx s'
Jonet litstar xx s'
Alexander gray xx s'
James Kintor xx s'
Summa totalis xvij li' and x s'

the said' day It was statut and ordanit be the aldirman
ballieis and consale present for the tyme that ale the baxtaris
of this burghe sale baik gude clene fresche weilbakin
breid' of quhet the tua penny laf clath weyand' xxxvj
vnce the penny breid' weyande xviij vnce and the demi
half penny breid' weyand' ix vnce Ande haf euer
breid' redy to serue the tone equalie of the saidez
tua penny bredis penny bred' and half penny bredis
haldand' the said' pace and wechtis And' the brekaris
of this Statute and common ordinance salbe pvnist eftir the
forme of the kingis lavis and Secludit the Craft for' yer and day

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiijo
die Aprilis anno quo Supra

Eodem die Johannes litstar filius quondam thome litstar conuictus fuit per
assisam Juratam ex ore thome leslie prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Andree
gray pro quo fuit in Amerciamento Curie et cetera Cuj emendabit ut Jura
volunt et dictus Andreas conuictus fuit de perturbio prefati Johannis

Eodem die Johannes litstar filius quondam thome litstar conuictus fuit
per assisam Juratam ex ore Thome leslie prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio
Elizibeth' hay Sponse alexandri gray pro quo fuit in amerciamento Curie
et cetera Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die gilbertus litstar frater dicti Johannis litstar conuictus fuit per
assisam Juratam ex ore thome leslie prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio ma
riote anfray et Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die gilbertus litstar frater Johannis litstar conuictus fuit per
assisam Juratum ex ore thome leslie prelocutoris eiusdem per pro perturbio Jonete
moir' Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt et cetera

Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta In
pretorio eiusdem vicesimo Octauo die mensis Aprilis
Anno Domini millesimo et quingentesimo

head.add: the gravntaris of Salmond' and money to Saint Nicholesleid' et cetera

div.p:
TheThere are several tallies in the left margin. saide day thir personis vndir writin of thar avne
fre will motyve and gud' mynde In the honor of ale
mychtj god et cetera and thar glorious' patrone Saint Nicholes
Oblist and bande thame be the fathtis of thar bodiis thar
ayris executouris and assignez' be ale thar gudis and landis to content
and pay to the aldirman and balyeis or mastir of the kirk
werk of abirdene for the tyme thir Somes of Salmond'
and money to the bying and pament of leid' to thar saide
kirk In the first sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' aldirman ane barrele
of Salmond' Alexander menyeis j barrel salmond' Robert blinsele
j barrel Salmond' Jonhne Cullan j barrel salmond' Alexander Rede j
barrel salmond' thomas prat j barrel Salmond' Robert Crag demi barrel
salmond' Williame futhes demi barrel salmond' William chamer demi
barrel salmond' Johne blak demi barrel salmond' Alexander gray demi barrel salmond'
William andirson' Jacobi x s' Duncan Colison' v s' William
of murray v s' Johne Duncanson' v s' george byssat demi merce
Malcum Crag demi barrel girls' Alexander lindesay v s' patrik leslie
demi barrel girls' or the vaile / george boll demi barrel salmond'
Robert hay ij s' Jonhne King x s' thome chapman demi
merce Androw meldrum s' Thome forsy ij s' Alexander
burnatThere is a tally in the left margin, and some notes from a later period in the right margin. iiij s' Jonhne' meldrum iij s' Androw Cullan yongar demi barrel salmond'
mastir Androw byssat x s' Jonhne annand' iiij s' thome Wode
demi merce Thome Alexanderson' ij s' Alexander hay v s' Androw steuinson'
ij s' William scherar' litstar iiij s' Alexander blak x s' Androw
Watson' in Cullane ij s' Jonhne talyour Crukschank ij s'
Androw mureson' iij s' thome philp ij s' Robert rede iiij s'
thome Wodman ij s' Alexander brabner ij s' William gray
ij s' James torne ij s' Androw Johnson' ij s' Robert futhes ij s'
Thome Johnson' v s' Alexander hay litster iij s' Philp Kelly
ij s' Androw hatmakar xij d' Thome meldrum v s' Johne
fullertone ij s' thome Narne ij s' gilbert patersone ij s'
Androw murray xiij s' and iiij d' thome gerat xij d' Johne
Horne v s' Androw louson v s' James gourlay v s' William
balhelvy ij s' Dauid talyour ij s' Androw michelson' ij s' Syme
richerdson' iiij s' Androw body ij s' Androw low ij s' Johne tulibo
iij s' Alexander gray v s' thome Watsone v s' Dauid Srathachin
v s' Cristy prat v s' John portar iij s' Johne Wilyongson'
demi merce Johne thomsone demi barrel girls' William Andirsone eldar
iiij s' Alexander malyssone ane quartar barrel of girls' or v s' William
lammyntone v s' Johne Andirson' demi merce Apone the quhilkis
the aldirman askit at me sere Johne Stirueling common' clerk and
notar Instrumentis Testibus Dominis Willelmo Rolland' Andrea gray Andrea
chamer Johanne Rede capellanis philippo Dunbrek Andrea nachtj Jacobo
leis Willelmo scrimgeour seriandis Actum erunt hoc in pretorio hora quasi duodecima
meredie et cetera

the xiiij day of aprile the yer' of god' jm and fyve hundretht yeris
In presence of sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' aldirman Alexander Rede patrik
leslie and Androw fyf Jonhne of mar' deliuerit his chartir of the half
of the landis of folayblakwattir selit vndir the seile of James
vmquhile erle of buchane to the said' patrik in ferme keping
to his vtilite and profit Ande to be redy to be schewin and producit
and deliuerit to Williame blakhale of that Ilk quhene It
beis sene Spedfull and necessar to be hed' for the profit of the
said' Williame And' atour the said' Williame blakhall oblist
him his ayris executouris ande assignez' be the fathtis of thar
bodiis to content and pay to the saide Jonhne his ayris executouris
or assignez' tuenty merkis vsuale money of Scotland' at
the fest of Sanct michael next hereftir follouing or within
aucht dais thareftir at the ferrast of the rest of iiijxx merkis
aicht to the said' Jonhne and his fadir for the wedset of the saide
landis And' gif It happinnis the said' William his ayris or
assignez' to want the Witsonday and martymes maile of the
said' landis of folayblakwattir or ony part of the said'
tua termes maile that salbe allouit the said' William
his ayris executouris or assignez' in the said' tuentj merkis

div.head: burgenses extra manentes
div.p:
+ Eodem dieThis is most likely a continuation of the court on page 1044. thomas Watson' in govelis Johannes Watson' in gouellis
Andreas philp in Kynellar Adam Weir' Andreas barkar' Johannes Wilkeson'
in crovmar' thomas Johnson' georgius Johnson' Johannes Crukschank in
fyve Dauid chamer in Cullane et Andreas Dwne amerciamentj in defectu
presencie

Eodem die Communitas huius burgi per preconem et officiarios premunita et
Congregata Circualiter per officiarios Inquisita consenciebat ad conseruandum
dictum burgum in meliora forma qua poterit nullo condicen'

The saide day gilbert tulidef baxtar accusit for the skath done be him
and his donge to Thomas pratis scheip in balnagask put him in the
balyeis will for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the Court sic
as he aw to tyn' of law and to Amend' as law will and forber' in
tym to Cum et cetera

The said' day huchon' of Wellis deponit be his aith that gilbert tulidef hed'
skathyt thomas prat ane wedir that was deid' with his donge and sclane
price v s' and ane vthir weddir was avay throw the said' gilbert and his dong'
of the price forsaid'

the said' day William Alexanderson' deponit be his aithe that he tuk gilbert of tulidefis
dong of one wedir of thomas pratis quhilkis he hed' wereit
price v s'

Eodem die Accedens ad barram procurator Dauid liell et eo nomine domini
Johannis Stirueling capellanj capelle Sancte Katherine virginis et
protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sex s' sibi et dicte
Capelle annuatim debit' de quadam terra penitus vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum
in vico nauium ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Robertj ranison'
ex australi et terram quondam Ricardi Walterj crafurd' ex boreali Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reprehendit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit
in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Dauid Srathachin thoma
Narne et Jacobo leis seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Willelmus Wormet et Dauid liell procuratores
magistri Andree cadiow protestati sunt in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu
Sex s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico
Nauium ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Willelmi Kymdy constabi
larij de Abirdene ex Orientali ex vna et terram quondam Ricardi crafurd' ex
occidentali partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus austrum et Communionem ve
nellam versus boriam in defectu solucionis vtrius dicti annuj Redditus aliquo
tempore debit' et non solut' Ad quam Accedens nichil reprehenderunt
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo
presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus Dauid strathachin
Thoma Narne et Jacobo leis seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Andreas murray et protestabatur in forma
Juris pro vno annuo Redditu xviij s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente
in vico Castrj extra portam ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter Communiones vias
Ad quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et la
pides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius
processus testibus Johanne Wilyongsone Roberto pipar et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Johannes blak protestatus fuit in forma
Juris pro vno annuo Redditu duarum mercarum vsualis monete scocie
sibj annuatim debit' et a longo tempore non solut' de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terras gilberti Waus
de many et thome prat versus oriens et boream et Communiones vias
Regias versus Occidens et Austrum Ad quam terram Accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit
in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Dauid straloche thoma
Narne et Jacobo leis seriando

head.add: electio abbatis et prioris de bonacard'

div.p:
One may day the yer' forsaid' Jonhne of mar' and Dauid mar'
was chosin be the aldirman ballieis Consale and communite in the
office of Abbat and prior' of bonacord for this yer' tile excerce
and vys' the saide office eftir the lovabile consuetud' and vys' of the
burghe for the quhilkis thai promittit to content and pay to the saide
Abbat and prior of bonacord' tene markis vsuale money of
Scotland'

The s
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto
die maij anno quo Supra

the saide day the aldirman and ballies assignit friday that next
Cumis to the prior of the Carmelitis Jonhne Waus and Robert
gothtray to bring thar' chartiris and Richtis quhilkis thai haue and will
vys' anent the marchis and diuers' debatable' betuix thar landis

Eodem die Johannes Waus inuenit thomam Waus plegium legalem
quod Robertus gothtray erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris
Et dictus Robertus Inuenit Dauid mar' plegium legalem quod dictus
Johannes erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris Et qualibet
dictarum parcium obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes
de huiusmodi fideiussione et cetera
